definition: woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
(bird species of China) Indian jungle crow (Corvus culminatus)

sentences.english: The enemy are in the forest and must be dislodged .
sentences.chinese: 敌人在丛林里，必须将他们赶出来。

sentences.english: We fought with them with grenade and sub-machine gun in the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 在丛林中，我们用手榴弹和轻机枪挣扎着。

sentences.english: Similar balls are in the jungles of Costa-Rica.
sentences.chinese: 哥斯达黎加的丛林里也有类似的东西。

sentences.english: The sound of the careless passage of the jungle wayfarer come to the ear of the animal.
sentences.chinese: 丛林里旅人漫不经心穿过的声音传到了动物的耳里。

sentences.english: The survivors wandered about the jungle for days before being picked up by a search party.
sentences.chinese: 幸存者在丛林中游荡了好几天，才被搜索队救出来。

sentences.english: They made their way through a jungle woven with creepers and vines .
sentences.chinese: 他们穿过一个被攀援植物和藤蔓植物缠绕的丛林。

sentences.english: In the jungles of 1)Guatemala, in Tikal, stands a temple.
sentences.chinese: 在危地马拉丛林深处的蒂卡尔，矗立着一座神庙。

sentences.english: The two hunters wheel around and ride into the woods along a game trail.
sentences.chinese: 着两个猎人骑着马绕了几圈然后相互追逐着奔进丛林。

sentences.english: When the day arrived, the headman assembled all the villagers and led them into the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 到了约定时日，大臣召集全部村民，带入丛林。

sentences.english: ‘The Jungle Book’ is a fantastic book to read and is suitable for all ages.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道《丛林故事》是老少皆宜值得一读的书。

sentences.english: So we found our way out to the dirt road that led deeper into the forest.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们就出来顺着泥路往丛林深处走。

sentences.english: The new road was hacked out of the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 这条新路是在丛林地带开辟出来的。

sentences.english: When the police hit the shore, they fled into the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 当警察到达河岸时，他们逃进了丛林。

sentences.english: Jungle Republic Legal Adviser, where are you?
sentences.chinese: 丛林共和国法律顾问，你在哪里？

sentences.english: As the enemy advance continued, whole families would take to the bush.
sentences.chinese: 随着敌军逼近，家家户户都将逃入丛林。

definition: Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
